hero.title: TFT Rival Bot
hero.subtitle: The ultimate Discord bot for Teamfight Tactics players. Track your stats, compete with friends, and dominate the arena!

feature1.title: Stats Tracking
feature1.description: Track your TFT performance, win rates, and rankings all in one place.

feature2.title: Fast & Reliable
feature2.description: Lightning-fast responses and 99.9% uptime to keep you connected.

feature3.title: Easy to Use
feature3.description: Simple commands and intuitive interface make it accessible for everyone.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join thousands of players already using TFT Rival Bot to improve their game!

commands.title: Commands
commands.subtitle: Discover all available commands to enhance your TFT experience
commands.footer: Use !help to display the help message with all available commands.

list.name: List
list.description: Display the list of tracked players

rank.name: Rank
rank.description: Display the TFT ranking of tracked players

channel.name: Channel
channel.description: Set the channel for automatic updates

setTime.name: Set Time
setTime.description: Display the time of daily updates

about.title: About TFT Rival Bot
about.subtitle: Learn more about our Discord bot

what.title: What is TFT Rival Bot?
what.description: TFT Rival Bot is a powerful Discord bot designed specifically for Teamfight Tactics players. It helps you track your statistics, compete with friends, and stay on top of your game. Whether you're a casual player or a competitive ranked player, TFT Rival Bot provides the tools you need to improve and have fun.

features.title: Key Features
features.feature2: Comprehensive match history and performance metrics
features.feature4: Easy-to-use commands with detailed help system

why.title: Why Choose TFT Rival Bot?
why.description: We're committed to providing the best experience for TFT players. Our bot is constantly updated with new features and improvements based on community feedback.

reason1.title: Always Updated
reason1.description: Regular updates with new features and bug fixes

reason2.title: Community Driven
reason2.description: Built with feedback from the TFT community

developer.title: Developer & Technical Details
developer.developerDescription: TFT Rival Bot is developed with passion and dedication. Built to provide the best experience for TFT players.

bug.title: Report a Bug Issue
bug.description: Found a bug or issue? Help us improve by reporting it. Please provide as much detail as possible.
bug.stepsPlaceholder:
1. Step one...
2. Step two...
3. Step three...
bug.success: Thank you for reporting this bug! We'll investigate and get back to you.

feedback.title: Leave Feedback
feedback.description: We'd love to hear your thoughts! Share your feedback, suggestions, or ideas to help us improve TFT Rival Bot.
feedback.success: Thank you for your feedback! We appreciate your input.
